verbs.description: In spite of the fact that [ARG1: Trump 's statements] [V: are] [ARG2: false and incredibly ignorant] , Texas governor Greg Abbot is sticking with his man .
In spite of the fact that Trump 's statements are false and incredibly ignorant , Texas governor Greg Abbot [V: is] sticking with his man .
